seo.title: Food Delivery Menu
seo.description: Fast and easy food delivery service to spoil the foodie within you. Find international cuisines and top restaurant promos.

page_checkout.price_change_alert: Prices of some items may change for this order option.
page_checkout.prompt_text: Use other payment methods and enjoy exclusive promo only on Grab app.

banner.title: Your favourite food at your fingertips

1.text: Find something you like with our specially curated restaurant list.
1.title: Discover Great Restaurants

2.text: Be it one item or more, we'll be sure to deliver them all!
2.title: No Minimum Order

3.text: Just stay home and enjoy your favourite food!
3.title: Delivery to Your Doorstep

footer.text: Download the Grab app and start ordering now! You know you want it.

page_home.heading: Discover restaurants here, order through the Grab app!

accept_cash.content: Sure, we do! GrabFood accepts all forms of payments for food delivery services, including cash on delivery.
accept_cash.title: Does GrabFood accept Cash?

delivery_timing.content: We understand only one language - food, so yes, we do. Please note, though we are here as your 24x7 food partners, few of our listed restaurants may have late-night food delivery restrictions or may be unavailable for orders.
delivery_timing.title: Does GrabFood provide food delivery 24x7?

how_much.content: Our delivery fee depends on a lot of operational factors like distance from your location to the restaurant. You can check the exact amount you are paying as delivery charges before checking out on the Grab app. You can also subscribe to GrabUnlimited to get a Free Delivery for your orders.
how_much.title: How much does GrabFood charge for delivery?

how_to_order.content: Here is the easiest way to order food from GrabFood in  Indonesia:

point1.content: Enter your address on the home page. Look at the GrabFood Listed Restaurants and Food spots near you. Pick your favorite restaurant and browse through the menu and select the dish you want to order.
point1.title: Search your favorite restaurant or the dish

point2.content: Once sure that you are ordering enough, click on the "ORDER NOW" tab and enter your final food delivery address. Choose the payment method that best suits you, and checkout.
point2.title: Checkout & Payment

point3.content: GrabFood has designed a seamless customer journey for you, so you can enjoy your food hassle-free. We will send you a notification for your order status.
point3.title: Delivery

how_to_order.title: How to order Grabfood online?

min_order.content: Yes! But you can pay the difference if your order is less than the minimum order amount.
min_order.title: Does GrabFood have a minimum order?

order_for_others.content:
Of course, pamper your loved ones by having their favorite food delivered to their door.
mungkjadi Just update the recipient's name and delivery address before placing your order.
order_for_others.title: Can I order GrabFood for someone else?

pay_online.content: GrabFood accepts multiple forms of payments for online food orders, including online payments using a credit or debit card, PayPal or cash on delivery.
pay_online.title: Can I pay online on GrabFood for my food orders?

what_is_grabfood.content: GrabFood is the fastest Food Delivery service in  Indonesia. We have curated all your favorite dishes, restaurants, and cuisines to help you grab your food in the easiest & quickest way possible. Find and order your favorite cuisines across  Indonesia - order food online in just a few taps, from Thick Toast - Menteng for Breakfast, Mie Aceh Pandrah - Sawah Besar for Lunch, Ochim's Diner - Cikini for Dinner! We are here to satisfy your hunger with a wide selection of merchant partners in Indonesia.
what_is_grabfood.title: What is GrabFood?

which_restaurants.content1: What don’t we have on GrabFood? We boast the widest variety of restaurants and cuisines of any food delivery app in Indonesia. You can choose from thousands of restaurants on GrabFood Indonesia. You can order food online from all your favorite food spots from KFC, McDonald’s, Hokben, Richeese Factory, Pizza hut, Geprek Bensu, Burger King, Domino’s Pizza, Ayam Gepuk Pak Gembus, Rocket Chicken, Bebek Kaleyo, and many many more!
which_restaurants.content2: GrabFood also runs exclusive limited time promotions, deals and discounts for our listed restaurants. You can enjoy huge savings and tons of other offers on your food orders. Time to order now!
which_restaurants.title: Which restaurants are listed in GrabFood?

accept_cash.content: Sure, we do! GrabFood accepts all forms of payments for food delivery services, including cash on delivery in  Malaysia.
accept_cash.title: Does GrabFood accept Cash?

delivery_timing.content: We understand only one language - food, so yes, we do.. Please note, though we are here as your 24x7 food partners, few of our listed restaurants may have late-night food delivery restrictions or may be unavailable for orders. But we have listed the ones that love your late-night binging in our Late Night Delivery Section.
delivery_timing.title: Does GrabFood provide food delivery 24x7?

how_much.content: Our delivery fee depends on a lot of operational factors like distance from your location to the restaurant. You can check the exact amount you are paying as delivery charges before checking out on the Grab app. There is also a  “Free Delivery” section that lists restaurants near you that don’t charge for delivery.
how_much.title: How much does GrabFood charge for delivery?

how_to_order.content: Here is the easiest way to order food from GrabFood in Malaysia:

point1.content: Enter your address on the home page. Look at the GrabFood Listed Restaurants and Food spots near you. Pick your favorite restaurant and browse through the menu and select the dish you want to order.
point1.title: Search your favorite restaurant or the dish

point2.content: Once sure that you are ordering enough, click on the "ORDER NOW" tab and enter your final food delivery address. Choose the payment method that best suits you, and checkout.
point2.title: Checkout & Payment

point3.content: GrabFood has designed a seamless customer journey for you, so you can enjoy your food hassle-free. We will send you an instant email and SMS confirming your order and expected delivery time. Your food is then on its way.
point3.title: Delivery

how_to_order.title: How to order Grabfood online?

min_order.content: Yes! But you can pay the difference if your order is less than the minimum order amount.
min_order.title: Does GrabFood have a minimum order?

what_is_grabfood.content: GrabFood is the fastest Food Delivery service in  Malaysia. We have curated all your favorite dishes, restaurants, and cuisines to help you grab your food in the easiest & quickest way possible. Find and order your favorite cuisines across  Malaysia - order food online in just a few taps, from Kaya Toast for Breakfast, to Laksa for Lunch, from Kopi for brunch to Famous Malay Fish Curry for Dinner! We are here to satisfy your hunger with a wide selection of merchant partners in Malaysia.
what_is_grabfood.title: What is GrabFood?

which_restaurants.content1: What don’t we have on GrabFood? We boast the widest variety of restaurants and cuisines of any food delivery app in Malaysia. You can choose from thousands of restaurants on GrabFood Malaysia. You can order food online from all your favorite food spots from Mcdonalds, Texas Chicken, Din Tai Fung, Dominos Pizza, Burger King, 4Fingers, Starbucks, Secret Recipe, The Chicken Rice Shop, Sushi King, MyBurgerLab, Nandos, Subway, and many many more!

which_restaurants.title: Which restaurants are listed in GrabFood?

accept_cash.content: Sure, we do! GrabFood accepts all forms of payments for food delivery services, including cash on delivery.
accept_cash.title: Does GrabFood accept Cash?

delivery_timing.content: We understand only one language - food, so yes, we do.. delivery_timing.title: Does GrabFood provide food delivery 24x7?

how_much.content: Our delivery fee depends on a lot of operational factors like distance from your location to the restaurant. how_much.title: How much does GrabFood charge for delivery?

4-C4MFVA5ALUTZAJ.name: KOI Thé - One Raffles
4-C4MFVA5ALUTZAJ.promoDescription: Free Delivery (Min. spend S$20) with GrabUnlimited

4-C6AZTZJDEEUUUA.name: luckin coffee - One Raffles Place T2
4-C6AZTZJDEEUUUA.promoDescription: 20% off storewide. 30% off with GrabUnlimited. T&C apply.

4-CZEUR7LAUCDEC2.name: Guzman Y Gomez - Funan
4-CZEUR7LAUCDEC2.description:
MUST TRIES: Indulge in their mouth-watering dishes such as Spicy Grilled Steak Burrito, Slow Roasted Beef Taco, Farm Fresh Vegetable Quesadillas, Grilled Chicken Nachos, and Fish Salad. Guzman Y Gomez offers some of the best Mexican Cuisine serving a tantalizing collection of dishes that are suitable for family, large groups, catching up with friends and colleagues. From Burritos to Salads its extensive menu is reflective of the restaurant's efforts to cater to every palate. This restaurant is located at Funan (nearest train: City Hall MRT Station). Guzman Y Gomez is a very popular Mexican chain restaurant that offers not just Mexican foods but also the bragging rights of what is Mexico's food culture is. From their food to its service and to environment and ambiance that diners could experience is here at Guzman Y Gomez. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com
Get the latest food news there
4-CZEUR7LAUCDEC2.promoDescription: Free Delivery (Min. spend S$30) with GrabUnlimited

4-CYMFLRLTRA2WGX.name: Tip Top Curry Puff - One Raffles Place

4-C2AGSB4CRKVHL2.name: Killiney Kopitiam - Lorong Telok
4-C2AGSB4CRKVHL2.description:
Killiney Kopitiam foods are prepared in traditional way, they are known for their kaya toast, prata and also serves variety of beverages like coffee, teas and ice cold juices. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com
Get the latest food news there

SGDD01360.name: Authentic Hock Lam Beef Noodles - 13 North Canal Road

SGDD06836.name: Gado & Grill - One Raffles Place
SGDD06836.description:
Gado & Grill offers some of the best Indonesian Cuisine serving a tantalising collection of dishes that are suitable for family, large groups, catching up with friends and colleagues. From Grilled Fish to Gado Gado, its extensive menu is reflective of the restaurant's effort to cater to every palate. This restaurant is located in One Raffles Place along Raffles Place. Gado & Grill is an ideal place where diners can enjoy delicious dishes in a casual and relaxed atmosphere that will surely deliver a memorable dining experience and gastronomic indulgence. MUST TRY: Indulge in their mouth-watering dishes such as Ayam Penyet, Grilled Chicken, Chunky Satay and Penyet Balls. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com
Get the latest food news there

4-C3VKNTDUFBXATX.name: Adam Road Mee Soto - Oxley @ Raffles

4-C25ZKECUCZD3AN.name: Twyst Pasta - Raffles Place MRT Station
4-C25ZKECUCZD3AN.promoDescription: 20% off storewide. 30% off with GrabUnlimited. T&C apply.

4-CYTKLXJFGRMVNA.name: Mr Bean - Raffles Place MRT Station

4-C4NBHA5KRYCYJE.name: Eat Bar - South Bridge Road
4-C4NBHA5KRYCYJE.promoDescription: Free Delivery (Min. spend S$20) with GrabUnlimited

4-CZLGCZDUNFMVPA.name: Old Tea Hut - One Raffles Place
4-CZLGCZDUNFMVPA.description:
Old Tea Hut is one of the best spots to visit when you want to treat yourself with some well-deserved refreshing beverages. They offer a pleasant experience with their menu featuring different flavours of tea and coffee beverages from time-honoured traditional drinks to original Old Tea Hut creations, as well as flavourful alternative beverages. Located at One Raffles Place and just a few minutes away from Raffles Place MRT Station, Old Tea Hut is a perfect place for families and friends where they can share a perfect morning cup with a healthy dose or a caffeine kick. MUST TRIES: Come and try their fine tea blends, rich coffee roast and tantalising beverages to satisfy your cravings! 
Source: hungrygowhere.com

4-CZLJUF2GG2C2TT.name: Shake Shack - 89 Neil Road
4-CZLJUF2GG2C2TT.description:
MUST TRY: ShackBurger, SmokeShack, 'Shroom Burger, Shack Stack, Hamburger, Chick'n Shack. Celebrity chef Danny Meyer opened Shake Shack as a small hot dog stand operating out of Madison Square Park in New York City in 2001. Today, there are a whopping 254 Shake Shack locations throughout the world. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com

SGDD11203.name: Toast Box - Raffles City
SGDD11203.description:
MUST TRY: Toast Box Traditional Toast, Golden Lava French Toast, Otah Toast, Chilli Crab Toast Sticks, Cheesy Chicken Chop Noodles. Toast Box offers some of the best Singaporean Cuisine serving a tantalizing collection of dishes that are suitable for family, large groups, catching up with friends and colleagues. From Toast Box Peanut Butter Thick Toast to Curry Chicken its extensive menu is reflective of the cafe's efforts to cater to every palate. This cafe is located in Raffle City Shopping Mall (nearest train: City Hall MRT Station). Toast Box serves a fragrant cup of Nanyang Kopi, crispy-grilled thick toast, and soft-boiled eggs for breakfast. For lunch, be spoilt for choice with the Nasi Lemak or Laksa. A velvety cup of Yuanyang, a robust Traditional Kaya Toast or a gratifying Banana Cake will also satisfy your taste buds. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com

SGDD04938.name: McDonald's - V-Hotel
SGDD04938.description:
MUST TRY: Buttermilk Crispy Chicken, Original Angus Cheeseburger, McCafe Latte, Caramel Frappe, Cheeseburger. McDonald's is a popular fast-food chain that serves breakfast meals, burgers, desserts, coffee and more, that are suitable for comforting solo meals, casual dining and group gatherings. Whether it's a quick snack or a meal, they've got something for everyone. Located at V Hotel Lavender (nearest train station: Lavender MRT Station), McDonald's provides a pleasant setting and a welcoming ambiance which makes it a great place to have quality time together with your family, friends or colleagues. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com

4-CZBCELADFEUHTN.name: Song Fa Bak Kut Teh - New Bridge Road
4-CZBCELADFEUHTN.description:
MUST TRY: Pork Ribs Soup, Pig's Kidney Soup, Pork Tenderloin Soup, Braised Pig's Trotter, Braised Pork Belly, Homemade Ngoh Hiang, Cai Xin. Song Fa Bak Kut Teh offers some of the best Teochew cuisine in Singapore, serving a tantalising collection of dishes that are suitable for casual dining and group gatherings. From warming soup recipes to delectable braised and side dishes, everything in the menu is reflective of the restaurant's efforts to cater to every palate. Located along New Bridge Road (nearest train: Clarke Quay MRT Station). Song Fa continues to keep the Bak Kut Teh experience as authentic as possible where you can enjoy their fall-off-the-bone tender pork ribs and flavourful, peppery, spice-infused hot broth in a vintage setting. 
Source: hungrygowhere.com
